Action.author: JIRAUSER20631
Action.body: I can create a PR if you tell me how

Action.author: yacovm
Action.body: To create a PR you need to fork the github repository and then commit locally in your fork, and then to open a PR via the github web UI.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Detailed pull request instructions can be found here: https://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/en/latest/github/github.html

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: FAB-17900 should be backported for the string versus int fix.
